title: A quarto extension for a report website project with the corporate identity of the Flemish government
description: This quarto extension assumes the output is a technical report to be published only as a website. Use this extension when you need to compile all file independently from each other. This can solve the out of memory problems when using a book type project. This repository has a demo report illustrating the available options.
